title: A generic shiny app to display (map and plot) size classes data
description: This is a generic Shiny app which can display any data complying with the Darwin Core format (e.g. GBIF data) and its eMoF extension. This Shiny app has been developped and is hosted in the same Virtual Lab provided by Blue-Cloud 2026 project which implements best practices for Open Science and FAIR data management.
